alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monroe and Wayne Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ypsilanti, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Belleville around 500 PM EDT. Romulus around 510 PM EDT. Taylor and Flat Rock around 520 PM EDT. Wyandotte and Trenton around 525 PM EDT. Grosse Ile around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Inkster, Brownstown Township, Melvindale, Gibraltar, New Boston, Sumpter Township, South Rockwood, Garden City, Riverview and Rockwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
